statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT id, biometric_data FROM user_preferences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT payment_option FROM user_preferences WHERE id > 3;

SELECT id, payment_option, biometric_data FROM user_preferences ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT biometric_data, payment_option FROM user_preferences WHERE payment_option = 'Credit Card';
SELECT id, recommendations FROM user_preferences WHERE biometric_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE biometric_data LIKE '%fingerprint%' AND payment_option = 'PayPal';
SELECT id, recommendations FROM user_preferences WHERE id > 3 AND recommendations IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 2;

SELECT username, payment_options FROM user_preferences JOIN payment_options ON user_preferences.user_id = payment_options.user_id

SELECT user_id, username, biometric_data->>'height' AS height_in_cm FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, username, payment_options->'billing_address' AS billing_addr FROM user_preferences WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, recommendations FROM user_preferences WHERE biometric_data @> '{"weight": 70}';
SELECT user_id, username, payment_options->>'credit_card_number' AS masked_card_number FROM user_preferences WHERE payment_options IS NOT NULL AND username <> 'admin';

SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_settings WHERE theme = 'Dark' OR language = 'Spanish';
